divs: Sighting DetailsWe were driving on 21mile towards schiener stoped at light when I observed these lights flying that were bright red flying low.I told my wife to start taking pictures of the the event as we tuned left on shiener. we observered seven objects that were red in color that were bright and made no noise flying northwest.I pulled in to a parking lot to see if i could get a video on my iphone.As i tried to get a video of one of the objects it kinda of zipped away to the northeast and vanished with no effort that is when i observered a plane heading in the direction of the objects.It gave my wife and i goose bumps and was very wierd what we saw.They moved very slow and when i got home to see the pictures I took i had thought that it had to be a hoax .But the pictures we tookgave mee the goose bumps and the way they look in the photo is very wierd as well. They are not red like what we saw with our own eyes ,they are a bright yellow ball of light.In one of our pictures there is a star with the object and you can see the difference between the two.There is also refeerence to trees and the objects in the picturesas well. It was just to wierd for us to be the only ones to see these objects.
trends: There have been 6 other sightings in Utica
There were no other sightings in Utica on or around September 11th 2012
Summary: My wife and I took pictures of evet on cellphone
